attributes.action: Add self-defence and first-aid to the P.E curriculum.
attributes.additional_details: Self-defence and first-aid are invaluable life lessons that save lives in moments when help is unavailable or on its way. These are not changes more major than simple logistics that would go a long way in the lives of students.
attributes.background: To make mandatory lessons of self-defence and first-aid in certain P.E lessons. Making it a neccesary topic to go over.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions instead:

Introduce first aid training to the national educational curriculum: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/318683

Make self-defence lessons mandatory in schools: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/329261
